License Application Requirements.description: Complete and sign the Arkansas collection agency license application. All sections must be completed on both the collection agency application and manager application.
Complete Section J on the application to list the agency fee, manager fee, number of collectors and total remitted. This is essential for the application to be processed.

Manager must have a SS# and a credit record. The application must be completed by the manager. The manager must have one-year experience on resume or written verification of more than 2 years experience in the industry. Manager must have excellent credit.
Attach an original collection agency bond signed by the president of the agency and witnessed. Amount varies based on the number of collectors.
Provide collector list and if using an alias, please provide. Only 1 alias can be used.

Background Checks.description: The company should use its own discretion in hiring employees. Collectors are registered under the company, making the company responsible for their conduct.

Additional Attachments.description: Attach a list of each officer, director, owner, with title, with business address.
Attach an organizational flow chart showing all parent companies, subsidiaries, affiliates, etc.

Attach the state fees payable to Arkansas State Board of Collection Agencies in the amount of $20.00 per collector, $20.00 for the manager fee, and $125.00 license fee. Separate checks are required for fees.

Application Completion.description: Ensure that Section J (Required Fees) and all other sections are completed on the collection agency application and manager application before submission.
Arkansas will not accept an incomplete application.
It is the responsibility of licensees to understand state rules and regulations: www.asbca.org
